snippet.title: Midnight Heist - Trailer | New CO-OP Horror Game 2023
snippet.description:
Wishlist Midnight Heist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2204350/Midnight_Heist

Try the free demo on Steam or itch.io
Itch: https://mediatale.itch.io/midnight-heist-demo
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2204350/Midnight_Heist

Go on heists through Midnight City alone or with up to three friends to fulfill tasks as a hacker for various organizations. Improve your reputation, earn money, customize your character and uncover the secrets of shady companies in this co-op horror game.

Social Media
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mediataleat
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MediaTaleAT

Website: https://games.mediatale.at

Midnight Heist is a psychological coop horror game which will be released in 2023 on Steam
